definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Jane bridled her favourite horse yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天簡給她心愛的馬裝上了馬鞍。

sentences.english: A glass cabinet holds a horse saddle encrusted in gems.
sentences.chinese: 一個玻璃櫃臺放着外表鑲嵌着寶石的馬鞍。

sentences.english: Introduced the designs and implementation plans of Maanshan CATV broadband data network.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了馬鞍山有線寬帶數據網的設計與組網方案。

sentences.english: She prefers to ride her horse bareback.
sentences.chinese: 她更喜歡騎馬時不用馬鞍。

sentences.english: Since 1981, development works have been extended to Ma On Shan.
sentences.chinese: 自一九八一年起，發展工程已延展至馬鞍山。

sentences.english: Inland, Ma On Shan County Park is a hiker's dream.
sentences.chinese: 在陸上，馬鞍山縣立公園是徒步旅行者夢想的地方。

sentences.english: Remember, you've just learned to ride sidesaddle.
sentences.chinese: 記住，你只是學會了騎女用馬鞍。

sentences.english: Maanshan has developed into an industrial city from a fishing village.
sentences.chinese: 馬鞍山已經從一個小漁村發展成爲了一個工業城市。

sentences.english: Passengers may change to Ma On Shan Rail trains at Tai Wai.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可以在大圍站換乘馬鞍山鐵路列車。

sentences.english: The former name of the school was Ma On Shan Lutheran Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 該校的前稱爲馬鞍山信義學校。

sentences.english: All three emerge from a tripedal base architects call the saddle.
sentences.chinese: 這三座塔共用一個被稱作馬鞍的地基。

sentences.english: JAKE nervously grips the surcingle of the mare.
sentences.chinese: Jake緊張的抓住母馬的馬鞍。

sentences.english: He wanted to buy the saddle garnished with silver studs .
sentences.chinese: 他想買那付有銀質飾釘的馬鞍。

sentences.english: Don ' t forget -font saddles and bridles!
sentences.chinese: 別忘了你的馬鞍和馬籠頭。

sentences.english: The saddle galled the horse's back.
The shells of the tortoises come in two basic varieties, dome-shaped and saddle-backed.
sentences.chinese: 這一亞種的巨龜有兩個基本的種羣，圓頂形和馬鞍型。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
paper pattern as model in dressmaking/paper patten
